title: Five stars for a castle in Tuscany
text:
Five stars for a castle in Tuscany   19,   
To discover beautiful luxury hotels worldwide you it is not always necessary to travel far. As part of the Luxury Fair loop - Luxury on our planet â€“ altogether one hundred exceptional boutique hotels, Grand Resorts and fine tradition houses from around the world present themselves to the audience. The exhibition is unique in the German market and provides hoteliers and sellers of tourist luxury products both a business as well as a networking platform. Among the exhibitors, that meet from 10. 13 April 2016 in Frankfurt am Main, is the five-star hotel Castello del Nero from Tuscany, near Florence. 
Lovingly converted from a 12th Century. Former a Castle and now a 5 star Luxury Hotel and proud member, since the opening in 2006, of the Leading Hotels of the World, Castello del Nero Hotel & Spa is located in Tuscany in the heart of the Chianti Wine region, just 30 minutes by car from Florence, Siena and San Gimignano. Each one of the 50 elegantly restored rooms and Suites, some of them with original frescoes from the 18th Century, is a unique masterpiece furnished with the ultimate technology comforts. Two Restaurants La Taverna with Tuscan wine & gastronomic flavours and La Torre, 1 Michelin star, offers a distinctive gourmet experience where guests are treated to attentive service while savoring the excellence. The ESPA center (1.000sq) offers customized treatments using own produced extra virgin olive oil, lavender and rosemary. A Fitness Suite, two tennis courts, an outdoor heated swimming pool and a complimentary shuttle service to Florence or Siena (at scheduled times), are available for all guests.
